title: Yasuo is balanced

embed.description: I screwed up my Windwall but if you place it correctly and time it you can solo at level 15 as long as you have those items and that mastery. Yasuo is balanced i think a buff would let him keep up with the meta :)

body:
Read the description for more info.

Rito pls no nerf yasuo he balanced or buff him pls

This is Satire

replies.body: he is actually lacking slightly in season 5, but with the adc meta, maybe he will pick up due to wall (probs more noobs feeding though)
